leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学-谱学解析与表征生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→峰识别→指认→定量→报告

queries: [WEB] chemical shift prediction machine learning github
[WEB] computer assisted structure elucidation CASE github

tools.name: hsqc_structure_elucidation
tools.one_line_profile: SGNN-based tool for NMR prediction and molecular distinction using HSQC simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing the SGNN graph neural network for 1H and 13C NMR prediction, specifically designed to distinguish between different molecules based on HSQC simulations.

tools.name: DiffSpectra
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular structure elucidation from spectra using diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a diffusion model approach for elucidating molecular structures directly from spectroscopic data.

tools.name: magnetstein
tools.one_line_profile: NMR spectra analysis tool using the Wasserstein metric
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for analyzing Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) spectra, utilizing the Wasserstein metric for spectral comparison and analysis.

tools.name: CSTShift
tools.one_line_profile: NMR chemical shift prediction integrating DFT and 3D GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improving NMR chemical shift prediction by integrating Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations with 3D graph neural networks.

tools.name: chem-spectra-app
tools.one_line_profile: Backend service for processing NMR, IR, and MS data files
tools.detailed_description: A backend web service designed to process various chemistry spectroscopy files including JCAMP, RAW, and mzML formats for NMR, IR, and Mass Spectrometry.

tools.name: simpleNMR
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based tool for liquid state NMR analysis
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool for the analysis of liquid state NMR data.

tools.name: MolSpectLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for spectroscopy and molecule elucidation
tools.detailed_description: A molecular foundation model designed to bridge spectroscopy, molecular structure elucidation, and 3D structure generation.

tools.name: FarSeer-NMR
tools.one_line_profile: Suite for analysis and plotting of bioNMR peaklists
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for automatic treatment, analysis, and plotting of large and multivariable datasets of bioNMR peaklists.

tools.name: K-MSE
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced tree search for molecular structure elucidation
tools.detailed_description: A tool boosting LLM's capability in molecular structure elucidation using knowledge-enhanced tree search reasoning.

tools.name: NMRProcFlow
tools.one_line_profile: GUI tool for 1D NMR metabolomics data processing
tools.detailed_description: An efficient graphical user interface tool for processing spectra from 1D NMR metabolomics data, facilitating spectral alignment and analysis.

tools.name: Rnmr1D
tools.one_line_profile: R module for 1D NMR data processing
tools.detailed_description: The core R module powering the NMRProcFlow application, providing functions for processing 1D NMR data.

tools.name: Spinach
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive spin dynamics simulation package
tools.detailed_description: A spin dynamics simulation package that covers the whole of magnetic resonance spectroscopy and imaging, including NMR, EPR, and MRI.

tools.name: ChemSharp
tools.one_line_profile: C# library for processing spectroscopy and structural files
tools.detailed_description: A .NET library for processing chemistry-related files, with a focus on spectroscopy data and structural file formats.

tools.name: NMR.jl
tools.one_line_profile: NMR data processing library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library designed for the processing and analysis of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) data.

tools.name: MolPuzzle
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal benchmark for molecular structure elucidation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) in solving molecular structure elucidation puzzles.

tools.name: NMR2Struct
tools.one_line_profile: NMR structure elucidation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for elucidating molecular structures from NMR data.

tools.name: nmrkit
tools.one_line_profile: Microservices for NMR data processing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of microservices designed to simplify and automate NMR data processing and analysis workflows.

tools.name: nmrxiv
tools.one_line_profile: FAIR NMR data repository and analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: A consensus-driven platform for the storage, management, sharing, and analysis of NMR data, adhering to FAIR principles.

tools.name: nmrpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for processing NMR spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing functionality for the processing and analysis of NMR spectral data.

tools.name: NMR-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive UI for solid state NMR analysis
tools.detailed_description: An interactive desktop application built with PyQt5 and nmrglue for performing solid-state NMR analysis.

tools.name: openchrom
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for mass spectrometry and chromatography data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source software for the visualization and analysis of mass spectrometric and chromatographic data.

tools.name: MS-BART
tools.one_line_profile: Unified modeling of mass spectra and molecules for structure elucidation
tools.detailed_description: A BART-based model for molecular structure elucidation from mass spectra, unifying the representation of spectra and molecules.

tools.name: PINT
tools.one_line_profile: NMR software for line shape fitting and analysis
tools.detailed_description: Software designed for NMR spectroscopy, focusing on line shape fitting and downstream data analysis.

tools.name: CSpred
tools.one_line_profile: Protein NMR chemical shift prediction tool (UCBShift)
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning-based program (UCBShift) for predicting chemical shifts of backbone atoms and beta-carbons in proteins using 3D structural features.

tools.name: GFN2NMR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Graph Convolutional Network for 13C NMR chemical shift calculation
tools.detailed_description: A deep graph convolutional network model designed to calculate 13C NMR chemical shifts with accuracy comparable to Density Functional Theory (DFT), aiding in structure assignment.

tools.name: nmrpro
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for processing NMR Spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools and functions for the processing and analysis of NMR spectra.

tools.name: py-4-pp
tools.one_line_profile: Python applications for petrophysics and NMR data processing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python applications and routines for petrophysics, including specific tools for NMR data processing, well log interpretation, and data analysis.

tools.name: stiefelFM
tools.one_line_profile: Stiefel Flow Matching for moment-constrained structure elucidation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Stiefel Flow Matching, a generative modeling approach for structure elucidation in chemistry, specifically designed to handle moment constraints.

tools.name: pyNMR
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for importing and handling NMR data from various vendor formats
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to import Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) data stored in formats such as Bruker (TopSpin), TecMag (NTNMR), Magritek (Kea), or Chemagnetics (Spinsight).

tools.name: PyNMRSTAR
tools.one_line_profile: Library for reading, writing, and manipulating NMR-STAR files
tools.detailed_description: A Python module maintained by the BMRB for handling NMR-STAR files, which are the standard format for storing biomolecular NMR data.

tools.name: ChemoSpec
tools.one_line_profile: Exploratory Chemometrics for Spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R functions for the chemometric analysis of spectroscopic data, including NMR, IR, and Raman spectra. It supports data plotting, PCA, HCA, and other multivariate analysis techniques.

tools.name: nmrium
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based component for displaying and processing NMR spectra
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive React-based component and platform for visualizing, processing, and assigning 1D and 2D NMR spectra directly in the browser.

tools.name: ANATOLIA
tools.one_line_profile: NMR spectra total lineshape analysis program
tools.detailed_description: A C++ program for total lineshape analysis of NMR spectra, capable of fitting complex spectral models to experimental data.

tools.name: mrsimulator
tools.one_line_profile: Fast solid-state NMR spectrum simulation and analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for fast simulation and analysis of solid-state NMR spectra, supporting various spin systems and experimental conditions.

tools.name: PALMA
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for DOSY signal processing
tools.detailed_description: An improved algorithm for processing Diffusion Ordered Spectroscopy (DOSY) NMR data, implementing the PALMA (Proximal Algorithm for L1-MInimization Analysis) method.

tools.name: projectaria_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for interacting with Project Aria egocentric data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source C++/Python toolkit to interact with data from Project Aria glasses, providing tools for calibration, data retrieval, and processing of egocentric machine perception data (SLAM, eye tracking, audio).

tools.name: ChemEx
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis program for chemical exchange detected by NMR
tools.detailed_description: A program for analyzing chemical exchange phenomena using NMR data, allowing for the fitting of relaxation dispersion and CPMG data.

tools.name: ml4nmr
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based correction for computed NMR chemical shifts
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that uses machine learning to correct systematic errors in quantum chemical calculations of NMR chemical shifts.

tools.name: nmr_sgnn
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable graph neural network for NMR chemical shift prediction
tools.detailed_description: Source code for a scalable graph neural network (SGNN) model designed to predict NMR chemical shifts from molecular structures.

tools.name: nmrglue
tools.one_line_profile: Module for working with NMR data in Python
tools.detailed_description: A robust Python module for reading, writing, and processing NMR data from various vendor formats (Bruker, Varian, Pipe, Sparky, etc.).

tools.name: shiftml
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of chemical shieldings of organic solids
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the machine learning-based prediction of NMR chemical shieldings in organic solids.

tools.name: SECS
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning framework for structure elucidation from spectra
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning framework designed for Structure Elucidation from Spectra (SECS), supporting data types such as NMR and IR.

tools.name: MAVEN
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for elucidating compound mechanism of action
tools.detailed_description: A tool to elucidate and visualize a compound's mechanism of action by combining structure-based target prediction with gene expression-based causal reasoning.

tools.name: 3D-DenseNet-ChemShift
tools.one_line_profile: 3D-DenseNet for Chemical Shift Prediction in NMR Crystallography
tools.detailed_description: A Multi-Resolution 3D-DenseNet deep learning model for predicting NMR chemical shifts in crystallography contexts.

tools.name: NMR.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for NMR spectroscopy in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing tools for NMR spectroscopy, including data processing and simulation capabilities.

tools.name: sherlock
tools.one_line_profile: Web Services for Computer-Assisted Structure Elucidation (CASE)
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based set of web services and tools for Computer-Assisted Structure Elucidation (CASE), aiding in the determination of chemical structures from spectral data.

tools.name: nmrplot
tools.one_line_profile: Python tool for plotting NMR spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility for visualizing and plotting NMR spectra, facilitating data inspection and presentation.

tools.name: ChefNMR
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic diffusion models for small molecule structure elucidation from NMR spectra
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of ChefNMR (NeurIPS 2025), utilizing atomic diffusion models to elucidate small molecule structures directly from NMR spectral data.

tools.name: GALLOP
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated molecular crystal structure determination from powder diffraction data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accelerated determination of molecular crystal structures using powder diffraction data, employing global optimization techniques.

tools.name: speaq
tools.one_line_profile: Informatics tools for quantitative analysis of NMR metabolomic profile data
tools.detailed_description: A suite of informatics tools designed for the quantitative analysis of NMR metabolomic profile data, facilitating peak alignment and quantification.

tools.name: relax
tools.one_line_profile: Software for molecular dynamics analysis from NMR data
tools.detailed_description: A software package for the study of molecular dynamics through the analysis of experimental NMR data, supporting model-free analysis and relaxation dispersion.

tools.name: SpinPlots
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for simplified plotting of NMR data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package built on top of NMRglue designed to simplify the process of visualizing and plotting NMR spectral data.

tools.name: CASCADE
tools.one_line_profile: Calculation of NMR chemical shifts using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for the prediction and calculation of NMR chemical shifts to assist in structure verification and assignment.

tools.name: nmrfit
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative NMR analysis through least-squares fitting
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for quantitative NMR analysis performing least-squares fitting of spectroscopy data to determine concentrations or kinetic parameters.

tools.name: POKY
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated software suite for automated NMR data analysis and structure calculation
tools.detailed_description: A next-generation software suite designed for integrated and automated NMR data analysis, including peak picking, assignment, and structure calculation.

tools.name: Legolas
tools.one_line_profile: Protein chemical shift prediction with PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based deep learning model for predicting protein NMR chemical shifts from structure.

tools.name: spinsolveproc
tools.one_line_profile: Library to process Spinsolve NMR experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python library specifically designed to process and analyze data from Spinsolve benchtop NMR spectrometers.

tools.name: nmr-to-structure
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of molecular structure from NMR spectra
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting molecular structures directly from NMR spectral data, likely utilizing machine learning approaches.

tools.name: nmrsim
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for NMR simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for simulating NMR spectra based on spin systems and pulse sequences.

tools.name: nmr_mpnn_pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Message Passing for NMR Chemical Shift Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Neural Message Passing networks for the prediction of NMR chemical shifts.

tools.name: AlpsNMR
tools.one_line_profile: Automated spectraL Processing System for NMR
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an automated pipeline for processing NMR spectra, including loading, normalization, and peak detection.

tools.name: ssnake
tools.one_line_profile: Program for the analysis of NMR data
tools.detailed_description: A software program designed for the analysis of NMR data, facilitating spectral interpretation and quantification.

tools.name: SpectroChemPy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for processing and analyzing spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework dedicated to processing, analyzing, and modeling various types of spectroscopic data (NMR, IR, etc.) for chemistry applications.

tools.name: SPIKE
tools.one_line_profile: Collaborative development for FT-spectroscopy processing
tools.detailed_description: A collaborative software project for processing Fourier Transform (FT) spectroscopy data, including NMR and other spectral forms.

tools.name: SpinachGUI
tools.one_line_profile: User interface for Spin Dynamics Simulation
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for setting up and running spin dynamics simulations, likely designed to work with the Spinach library.

tools.name: ukbnmr
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for processing Nightingale NMR biomarker data in UK Biobank
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing tools specifically for processing and analyzing Nightingale NMR biomarker data from the UK Biobank dataset.

tools.name: 4D-CHAINS
tools.one_line_profile: Software for protein NMR assignment
tools.detailed_description: Software designed for the automated assignment of protein NMR spectra, specifically leveraging 4D spectral data.

tools.name: nmr_peak_picker
tools.one_line_profile: Automated peak picking for high-dimensional NMR spectra
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automated peak picking in high-dimensional NMR spectra, facilitating the initial steps of spectral analysis.

tools.name: magres-format
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for CCP-NC ab-initio magnetic resonance file format
tools.detailed_description: A library for parsing and processing the CCP-NC ab-initio magnetic resonance file format (.magres), enabling analysis of calculated NMR parameters.

tools.name: drawnmr
tools.one_line_profile: Draw NMR data in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A tool to visualize NMR data within Jupyter Notebooks, leveraging nmrglue for data handling and bokeh for interactive plotting.

tools.name: mzkit
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive data toolkit for processing and visualizing NMR, Mass Spectrometry, and Raman spectroscopy data
tools.detailed_description: mzkit is a comprehensive toolkit designed for the processing, analysis, and visualization of various spectroscopy and spectrometry data types. It supports Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR), MALDI Mass Spectrometry Imaging (MSI), MALDI single-cell analysis, Raman Spectroscopy, as well as LC-MS and GC-MS raw data. It includes modules for chemoinformatics data analysis and provides visualization capabilities for scientific data.
